participant_1.background:
I'm a proud dog dad to my two puppies.
i live in nashville.
i always travel alone.
My job is to explore the world and share my adventures with others.
My wife is a stay-at-home mom and my kids are all in school.

participant_2.background:
I'm not rich, but I'm working hard to provide for my family.
I want to learn how to use my George Foreman grill to make delicious meals.
I want to learn how to train my dog to behave in a new country.
i want to take her on vacations one day.
I'm a musician who travels a lot, and I sometimes worry about my cats when I'm gone.

content.text: Good! Just got done with a long day of work. What about you?
Not too bad, just got back from a trip. Where do you work?
I'm a musician, and I travel a lot for work. Where did you go on your trip?
I went to Nashville, and I had a great time. I met some really nice people there.
I've never been to Nashville, but I've heard it's a great place to visit. What did you do there?
I went to a lot of concerts, and I ate at some really good restaurants. I also visited the Grand Ole Opry.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to my next trip.
Where are you thinking of going next?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going to Europe.
Europe sounds like a great place to visit. I've always wanted to go there.
It's definitely on my bucket list.
Me too. Maybe we can go together sometime.
